Package clientSide.entities

Class MasterThief

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
clientSide.entities.MasterThief
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class MasterThief extends Thread
Master Thief thread. It simulates the Master Thief life cycle. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on remote calls under Java RMI.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Life cycle of the Master Thief.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

    • startOperations

      public void startOperations()
      Transition start operations in the life cycle of the Master Thief. It is called by the Master Thief when he wants to start the heist operation in the museum. Remote operation.

    • appraiseSit

      public int appraiseSit()
      Transition appraise situation in the life cycle of the Master Thief. As long as the master thief remains in this transition -> state : DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO. Remote operation.
      Returns:
      next transition (DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO or ASSEMBLING_A_GROUP or WAITING_FOR_ARRIVAL or PRESENTING_THE_REPORT)

    • waitForThieves

      public void waitForThieves()
      Master blocks until enough ordinary thieves have arrived the concentration site. Master is notified whenever a thief arrives at the concentration site (amINeeded()). Remote operation.

    • assignAssaultPartyID

      public int assignAssaultPartyID()
      Function that checks if assault parties have already been created. If not, returns an id of the group that has not yet been created. Remote operation.
      Returns:
      assault party ID or -1 if groups have already been created.

    • assignRoomID

      public int assignRoomID()
      Get a room that has not yet been assigned and still has rooms. Remote operation.
      Returns:
      room ID or -1 if all used or empty

    • setAssignedRoomID

      public void setAssignedRoomID(int assaultPartyID, int roomID)
      New room assigned to the assault party. Remote operation.
      Parameters:
      assaultPartyID - assault party id
      roomID - assigned room id

    • buildParty

      public int[] buildParty()
      Master creates a 3-member assault party Remote operation.
      Returns:
      assault party with 3 thieves

    • addThievesToParty

      public void addThievesToParty(int assaultPartyID, int[] assaultParty, int roomID)
      Add the thieves chosen by the master to the created assault party. Remote operation.
      Parameters:
      assaultPartyID - identification assault party
      assaultParty - set of thieves to be added to the assault party
      roomID - identification of the room assigned to the assault party

    • prepareAssaultParty

      public void prepareAssaultParty(int[] assaultParty, int assaultPartyID, int roomID)
      Transition prepare Assault Party in the life cycle of the Master Thief. Remote operation.
      Parameters:
      assaultParty - list of ids of the 3 elements of the assault party
      assaultPartyID - identification assigned to the assault party
      roomID - room id assigned to the assault party

    • sendAssaultParty

      public void sendAssaultParty()
      Transition send Assault Party in the life cycle of the Master Thief. Remote operation.

    • takeARest

      public void takeARest()
      Transition take A Rest in the life cycle of the Master Thief. (DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO -> WAITING_FOR_ARRIVAL) Master thief is waken up by the operation handACanvas of one of the assault party members returning from the museum. Remote operation.

    • collectACanvas

      public Boolean[] collectACanvas()
      Transition collect a canvas in the life cycle of the Master Thief. Remote operation.
      Returns:
      assault parties for reseting and

    • resetAssaultParty

      public void resetAssaultParty(int assaultPartyIndex)
      Reset the values of the created assault party and the room associated with it. Remote operation.
      Parameters:
      assaultPartyIndex - assault Party Index

    • setAssigedAPid

      public void setAssigedAPid(int assaultPartyID, Boolean state)
      New state of the assault party. True if assigned, false otherwise. Remote operation.
      Parameters:
      assaultPartyID - assault party id
      state - status of the assault party

    • sumUpResults

      public void sumUpResults()
      Transition sum up results in the life cycle of the Master Thief. Remote operation.
